# rugilelt/EnsembleAgeR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of EnsembleAgeR is to allow users to easily calculate chronological age.


## Installation

```{r}
devtools::install_github("rugilelt/EnsembleAgeR")
devtools::install_github("MorganLevineLab/methylCIPHER")
```
